input.description: Alll specific configuration from the module.

Input event data based on common event model like:
<event> <metaData> <eventModelVersion>1.1.00</eventModelVersion> <eventClass>PATROL_EV</eventClass> <reportTime>1520007159</reportTime> <reportTimeEpoch>0</reportTimeEpoch> <notes>testing</notes> <eventId>Admin.bmcproactivenetperformancemanageractoradapter.47043420</eventId> </metaData> <sourceData> <componentHost>clm-aus-018145</componentHost> <componentHostAddress>172.22.231.209</componentHostAddress> </sourceData> <situationData> <situationCategory>CAPACITY_MANAGEMENT</situationCategory> <situationSubCategory>Service Down</situationSubCategory> <application>BAO-REPO</application> <severity>CRITICAL</severity> <situationTimeEpoch>0</situationTimeEpoch> <messageSummary>TESTEVENT02</messageSummary> </situationData> <reporterData> <componentHostAddress>172.22.231.209</componentHostAddress> <eventTime>1520007159</eventTime> </reporterData> <extendedData> <nameValueList> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>cell-name</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">Admin</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>mc-incident-id</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">INC00000111112</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>pem-alert-type</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">Disk Full</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>blah-blah</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">blah</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>mc-event-sub-category</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">Disk Full</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>mc-arrival-time</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">1520007159</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>mc-origin-key</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">10</value> </nameValue> </nameValueList> </extendedData> <metricsData /> </event>
Connection data to target based on event data.

Expect a collection of flags set up upstream.
<flags> <status>success</status> </flags>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <flags> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <change-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </change-created> <task-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </task-created> </flags> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//Debug/BypassRemediation/text() = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'${status}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Bypassing change/task processing because change creation is disabled for this event type:
or corresponding incident ticket does not exist
Bypassing change/task processing because change creation is disabled for this event type:
or corresponding incident ticket does not exist
Bypassing change and task processing because change creation is disabled or corresponding incident ticket does not exist.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <flags> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <change-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </change-created> <task-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </task-created> </flags> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'failure'"> <continue-processing> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </continue-processing> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <continue-processing> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </continue-processing> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <flags> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <change-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </change-created> <task-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </task-created> </flags> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'failure'"> <continue-processing> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </continue-processing> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <continue-processing> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </continue-processing> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <flags> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space('${change status}' )) > 0"> <change-status>${change status}</change-status> <task-status>${task status}</task-status> </xsl:if> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space('${task id}')) > 0"> <task-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </task-created> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <task-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </task-created> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space('${change id}')) > 0"> <change-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </change-created> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <change-created> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </change-created> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </flags> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'failure'"> <continue-processing> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </continue-processing> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <continue-processing> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </continue-processing> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Change and task created:</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' Change ID: ', //change-id/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"></xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' Change Status: ', //change-request-status/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"></xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' Task ID: ', //task-id/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"></xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' Task Status: ', //task-status/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"></xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Change and task created:</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' Change ID: ', //change-id/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text /> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' Change Status: ', //change-status/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text /> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' Task ID: ', //task-id/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text /> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' Task Status: ', //task-status/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text></xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test=". = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Change and Incident associations created successfully.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${error message}</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test=". = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${status}' = 'failure'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: ========= Remediation on Task Approval - Not updating incident because there is no associated incident ticket=====

documentation.description: A framework workflow to support any pre-remediation actions like ITSM or event updates, etc.
